generated_body: The article likely presents a unique visual comparison of individuals who are over 100 years old alongside their younger selves, offering insights into the passage of time and the changes that occur throughout life. Readers may expect to see powerful side-by-side portraits that highlight both the physical transformations and the enduring qualities of these centenarians. Additionally, the piece could delve into the stories behind these portraits, possibly exploring themes of longevity and the experiences of those who have lived through significant historical events.
